Major_Arcs.title: Guz's Trickery and Dinny's Dinosaur Saga
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc encompasses Guz's manipulative clam debt scheme, the introduction of Dinny and the dinosaur dealership, his trade, sale, and unexpected return, culminating in chaotic scenes involving Dinny.

sub_scenes.title: The Clam Debt Trick
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Guz's elaborate scheme to remind King Guz of an old debt by feigning drowning, highlighting Guz's cunning and manipulative nature.

sub_scenes.title: Dinosaur Shopping and the Zippy Dinosaur
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts to Alley Oop and the introduction of dinosaur-related issues, leading into the dinosaur dealership setting and a customer's eventful test ride of a 'zippy' dinosaur.

narrative_arcs.title: Honest Zog's Dinosaur Dealership and Shopping
The Zippy Dinosaur's Test Ride and Pinch
Concluding the Dinosaur Deal After Test Ride

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Trade and Farewell
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Dinny's trade-in by his owner, the emotional farewell, and Dinny's subsequent appearance for sale at the dealership, marking a transition for Dinny's storyline.

narrative_arcs.title: Dinny on Sale at the Dinosaur Dealership

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Unmasking and Chaotic Return
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers Dinny's unexpected return to the narrative through a bumpy dinosaur ride, his dramatic unmasking, and his subsequent uncontrolled and forceful reappearance, causing alarm.

narrative_arcs.title: Dinosaur Sales Pitch and Unpleasant Test Ride

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Entanglements and Fishing Trip Frustrations
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores romantic relationships, breakups, and the humorous frustrations experienced during a fishing trip, including misogynistic musings and interpersonal conflicts.

sub_scenes.title: Breakup and Misogynistic Musings
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene portrays Alley's failed attempt to invite Coola fishing, their breakup, and the subsequent misogynistic reflections on women's behavior by cavemen.

sub_scenes.title: Fishing Trip Annoyances and Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the specific annoyances and escalating tensions during a fishing trip, leading to a direct confrontation and apology among the cavemen.

narrative_arcs.title: Fishing Trip Annoyances: Baiting and Loud Talking
Confrontation and Apology on the Fishing Trip

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Rivalry and Misdirection with Cherie
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces romantic competition for Coola, leading to skepticism, investigation, and a potential misdirection involving another woman, Cherie.

narrative_arcs.title: Gossip and Competition for Coola's Affections
Skepticism and the Challenge to Verify Coola's Loyalty

sub_scenes.title: Jealous Violence and Romantic Rejection
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts a jealous confrontation escalating to violence, followed by a revelation of misdirected aggression and the woman's clear choice of another man, Koko.

narrative_arcs.title: Misdirected Aggression and a Name Revealed
Affectionate Comfort and a Confused Realization

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Strategy and Definition
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene involves a caveman seeking advice on romance, leading to a discussion defining romance and the introduction of a peculiar 'French fried freak' technique.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Gestures and Crocodile Interruption
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene showcases various romantic attempts, including flower and log gifts, humorously interrupted by a crocodile and followed by social critique.

narrative_arcs.title: Critique of Vulgarity and Subdued Crocodile

sub_scenes.title: Jealous Rage and Misunderstood Kiss
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts expressions of jealous rage, romantic interludes observed with confusion, and a violent intervention based on a misunderstanding of a kiss.

sub_scenes.title: Public Infidelity Accusations and Alley's Romantic Turn
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene includes public accusations of infidelity, violent retribution, and Alley's decision to adopt a romantic persona, observed with skepticism by other cavemen.

narrative_arcs.title: Alley's Romantic Resolution and New Approach

Major_Arcs.title: The Twitch Dance Fad and its Consequences
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc centers around the sudden popularity of the 'Twitch' dance, its unexpected physical dangers, and the social pressure to participate, culminating in a humorous hospital scene.

sub_scenes.title: Injuries from the Twitch Dance
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the physical consequences of the 'New Twist' dance, showing injured cavemen and highlighting the dance's risks.

narrative_arcs.title: Consequences of the New Twist Dance

sub_scenes.title: Social Pressure to Dance and Alley's Reluctance
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the social pressure exerted on Alley to learn the 'twitch' dance, his initial resistance, and Coola's ultimatum regarding the 'Big Twitch Party'.

narrative_arcs.title: Pressure to Participate in the Twitch Dance

sub_scenes.title: Dance Lessons and Identity Reveal
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the start of dance lessons, comedic mishaps during practice, and a significant plot twist revealing Alley's true identity as Miss Glump.

sub_scenes.title: Nighttime Humiliation and Hospital Ward
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene portrays nighttime discussions about the 'twitch', Alley's humiliation due to the dance, and a shift to a hospital ward filled with 'twitch' victims, revealing the widespread impact of the dance.

narrative_arcs.title: Nighttime Twitch Discussion and Mysterious Fear

Major_Arcs.title: Time Travel to Spain and Bullfight Adventure
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows the storyline of time travel initiated for research purposes, sending Alley and Ooola to 16th-century Spain, culminating in Alley's unexpected participation in a bullfight.

sub_scenes.title: Time Machine Idea and Preparation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the concept of using a time machine to research 16th-century Spain, showing the planning and preparation for time travel.

narrative_arcs.title: Researching 16th Century Spain and the Time Machine Idea
Preparing the Time Machine for Oop
Romantic Moonlight Scene with Alley and Ooola

sub_scenes.title: Transportation to the 20th Century and Spanish Assignment
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers Alley and Ooola's interrupted kiss, their unexpected transportation to the 20th century via time machine, and their assignment to travel to Spain for research.

narrative_arcs.title: Arguing and Agreeing to a Kiss
Time Machine Activation and Unexpected Transportation
Welcome to the 20th Century and the Spanish Assignment
Frustration over Interrupted Kiss and Justification for Time Travel
Postponed Kiss and Dispatch to Ancient Spain

sub_scenes.title: Arrival in Spain and Serenade Misunderstanding
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Alley's arrival in Spain, his initial confusion, and his immediate involvement in a serenade scenario, leading to a cultural misunderstanding and conflict.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival in Spain and Initial Confusion
The Serenade and the Annoyed Observer
Attack on the Serenader and Balcony Woman's Initial Reaction
Apology, Impending Consequences, and the Manager's Arrival

sub_scenes.title: Bullfight Preparation and Participation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the urgent preparations for a bullfight, a technical discussion about bullfighting, and Alley's recruitment and unexpected participation in the event.

narrative_arcs.title: Urgency to Start the Bullfight and Crowd's Demand
Spectator Commentary on Bullfighter's Appearance and Weapon Choice
Doubt and Reassurance about the Bullfighter's Courage

Major_Arcs.title: Oop's Return and the Unkissed Revelation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the decision to bring Oop back from the past, his return in a captured state, and the surprising twist where Oop denies the promised kiss, hinting at a significant discovery.

sub_scenes.title: Decision to Retrieve Oop
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene begins with the decision to bring Oop back from his mission in Spain to gather information.

narrative_arcs.title: Decision to Retrieve Oop for Information

sub_scenes.title: Interlude - Spanish Courting Scene
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene presents a brief, unrelated romantic scene in a Spanish setting, possibly for thematic contrast or interlude.

narrative_arcs.title: Courting Scene with Spanish Lady and Gentleman

sub_scenes.title: Oop's Captured Return and Kiss Denial
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Oop's return in a captured state, Jane's relief, her reminder of a promised kiss, and Oop's shocking denial of the kiss, suggesting a significant revelation during his mission.

narrative_arcs.title: Oop's Abduction and Jane's Relief at His Return
Jane Reminds Oop of Promised Kiss
Oop's Unexpected Denial of Kiss and Revelation

Major_Arcs.title: King for a Day and the Reign of Rocks
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc humorously explores the concept of 'King for a Day', the initial appeal and subsequent realities of temporary kingship, culminating in a public revolt and the original king's manipulative return to power.

sub_scenes.title: The Reality of Throne Life
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the 'King for a Day' concept and the humorous discrepancy between the perceived and actual experience of being a temporary king.

narrative_arcs.title: King for a Day and the Reality of Throne Life

sub_scenes.title: Temporary Replacement and Proclamation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the 'King's' plan to leave and appoint a temporary replacement, followed by the new temporary king's proclamation and demand for respect.

narrative_arcs.title: King's Planned Absence and Temporary Replacement
Proclamation and Respect Demand for Temporary King

sub_scenes.title: Reign of Rocks and Original King's Return
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene portrays the immediate and hostile rejection of the temporary king by the crowd, followed by the original king's return and his subtly manipulative enjoyment of the situation.

narrative_arcs.title: Reign of Rocks: The Temporary King's Downfall
Aftermath and the Original King's Return

Major_Arcs.title: Guz's Substitute Day and Clam Dispute Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc features Guz substituting for someone, experiencing domestic chaos, and a separate storyline where a crowned figure resolves a clam dispute with the help of a wise elder.

sub_scenes.title: Guz's Misunderstood Leisure and Oompa's Ire
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Guz's mistaken enjoyment of ulcer pills, his confrontation with Oompa over his dirty feet, and his attempt to explain his actions as a substitute.

narrative_arcs.title: Guz's Misunderstood Leisure and Oompa's Ire
Guz's Tub Contemplation and Vacation Insight

sub_scenes.title: Clam Dispute and Wise Elder's Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene showcases various disputes, including cheating accusations and a money fight, leading into a central conflict over missing clams, resolved by a wise elder.

narrative_arcs.title: Accusation of Cheating in a Game
The Mystery of the Missing Clams and Royal Inquiry
Royal Deduction and Wise Elder Intervention in the Clam Dispute
Wise Elder's Resolution: 'Nothing Left to Fight About'

sub_scenes.title: Palace Racket and Money Keeping Advisor
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene involves investigating a disturbance at 'Moonina Palace', revealing a fight, and then focuses on the crowned caveman confronting his advisor about keeping money.

Major_Arcs.title: Unpleasant Kingship and the Barberous Act
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc continues the crowned king's storyline with an unpleasant dinner due to health restrictions and transitions into a new narrative about a 'Barberous Act' involving forced shaving.

sub_scenes.title: Unpleasant Dinner and King's Regret
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene portrays a dismal dinner scene for the crowned king due to his ulcer, leading to his expression of regret about becoming king.

sub_scenes.title: Apologies and Job Rejection
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows apologies exchanged between Guz and Oompah, and Oompah's vehement rejection of Guz's job, linking back to the earlier Guz storyline.

narrative_arcs.title: Measuring with a Board and Strange Duck

sub_scenes.title: Introduction and Execution of the Barberous Act
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the 'Barberous Act' through prophecy and initial setup, then reveals it to be a forced and unpleasant shaving process, finally establishing it as a commercial service.

Major_Arcs.title: Time Machine Mishap and the Roman Centurion
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc concludes the narrative with a return to the time machine storyline, depicting a malfunction resulting in the unexpected arrival of a Roman Centurion instead of Oop.

sub_scenes.title: Time Machine Setup and Malfunction
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the inventor preparing his time machine to bring Oop to the present, but a malfunction leads to the arrival of a Roman Centurion instead.
